nodes.text: A pin-up of a Rodian was a decorative poster available on the planet Coruscant during the Clone Wars. It was addressed to an individual named Jason, and depicted a female Rodian posing in a blue dress and white stockings. The Aurebesh inscription on the upper-right corner of the image read "To Jason X0X0."

The poster was still available following the creation of the Galactic Empire. The crew of the Ghost had their own personal copy inside the ship. For some reason, the Aurebesh caption was missing from this version.
